So, in this text, Hind Swaraj or Indian Home Rule, he provides a critique of colonialism and western civilization and it also, deals with his theory and practice of non-violence

So, in this text, besides responding or clarifying the confusion around this term Swaraj, he was also, providing a critique, theoretical critique to the modern western civilization and also, he compared the violence or the non-violence method
